3.0.0.name: wordpress/get-opml
3.0.0.description:
The plugin can search for the RSS address from your blog Links(Blogroll) automatically,and create a OPML menu.You can insert it into the Reader that support OPML like Google Reader(http://reader.google.com),then you can add all RSS address to Reader one-time.You can also share the menu to your friends. (Version 3.1.0)You can get the RSS url from Technorati.com now! Faster,and more efficient! You need a Technorati API-KEY from http://technorati.com/developers/apikey.html by free.

该插件能自动搜索您的友情链接(Blogroll)的RSS地址，并生成 OPML列表。您可以将该列表导入支持OPML的阅读器，如Google Reader,鲜果,抓虾，即可一次性添加您所有好友的RSS地址。您也可以将该列表分享给您的朋友。 (自版本3.1.0起)现在可以从Technorati.com获取博客的RSS地址了！ 速度更快，效率更高！ 需要访问
